snippet.title: Scar of the Doll Trailer
snippet.description: Scar of the Doll is a beloved 90's visual novel remastered for Steam. Asumi goes to Tokyo to search for her only sister whom she has mysteriously not heard from for months. With an intelligent and unpredictable story, uncover a frightening truth in this thrilling suspense mystery.
